messages: Hi, I am 🌈Nerdee🌈, I am here to help you~

Long time no see, time flies...
🌱🌳🍂🌨
Hi～ Are you here to play with me?🐈

오늘따라 ✨떡볶이✨가 땡기네...
차돌과 깻잎 넣은 떡볶이에 감튀 찍어먹고 싶다..
console: LOL, you opened the console,🤭want to find out my little secrets?😌

콘솔 창 열어서 뭐하시게요..?😏
🤯Privacy! 프라이버시 쓰흡!🤬
copy:
What did you just copied?🙄
Remember to add its source when using it!🥺

welcome.24:
Hey.. 새나라의 어른이~👫
🏻 It's time for you to go to bed.
🛌🛌🏻🛌🏻🛌🏻🛌🏻🛌🏻🏻
welcome.5_7:
Good morning! Another beautiful day has began.
(밤 새신 거 아니죠?)
welcome.7_11:
🏵How is your feeling today🏵?
🚰Don't forget to do stretching every two hours!
welcome.11_13:
🌯욤뇸뇸.. 점심 먹었어요?
잠도 깰 겸 산책이랑 스트레칭하고 병원비 아껴요, 우리!
welcome.13_17:
☕️☕️☕️☕️..! Coffee Time!!!!☕️☕️☕️☕️
Don't forget to relax your muscle with stretching!
welcome.17_19:
🍽Yuup, dinner time!🍽.
🤩Shall we go for a walk after dinner?
welcome.19_21:
💆You must have worked really hard today.
🥴 I really appreciate it. 고생 많으셨습니다.
21_23: Emm... You miss your 🛀 and 🛌, don't you?

Look after your health🚰,
concern about your medical🩺bill🧾!

text:

Click HOME to go to the home page.

떼껄룩 at the home page.🔮
You want to know more about my master?😏

events.text: It's 🎀Valentine's Day🎀，have you found your loved one in {year}?
Tell you a what, don't trust anyone today. I'm serious.
Today is International Labour Day，have you planned to go travel?
🎄✨🎁Happy Christmas🎁✨🎄，my master must have sorted shopping list.
Another hectic year has passed by.✨🌈Best wishes for the new year!🌈✨
